attributes.action: revise the Driving Test Theory questions so that they are relevant to actually driving a motor vehicle.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The theory test questions include such things as how many times per minute should one perform heart massage!! This question is rediculous in the extreme and irrelevant to drving a motor vehicle. This, and many many other irrelevant questions need to be removed from the theory test. Seems that someone was told to get the number of questions up and ran out of sensible ideas.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the DVLA.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
